articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: China says it wants to avoid US sanctions over Russia's war - The Star Online
articles.description: BEIJING (Bloomberg): China wants to avoid being impacted by US sanctions over Russia’s war, Foreign Minister Wang Yi said, in one of Beijing’s most explicit statements yet on American penalties that are contributing to a historic market selloff.

articles.title: Why 10,000 steps a day is NOT holy grail: Study finds 6,000-8,000 cuts risk of early death in HALF - Daily Mail
articles.description: American researchers reviewed findings from 15 studies which looked at the effect of daily steps on mortality from all causes for nearly 50,000 people in four continents.
articles.content:
Ten thousand daily steps is not the sweet spot for health, according to a study that suggests just 6,000 is enough.
